column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We love to come here for the food! Absolutely amazing every time and the servers are great at recommending items. I'm dropping a star because I went in to order food to go and they gave my order to someone else after I stood there for thirty minutes. They called the person back and handed me the bag he gave back... the bartender was so nice about it
column2: but honestly that kinda grossed me out. I really didn't want food that someone else potentially picked through. I'll keep going back
column3: but I won't order take out again!
